attributes.action: Legislate to enforce that all are treated equally in the eyes of the Law.
attributes.additional_details: Under the declaration of rights 1689 all Citizens must be treated equally. Political based policing and judiciary are shameful and illegal and the Government must act enforce that all are treated equally under law irrespective race, religion, colour or personal circumstance
attributes.background: The lord chief justice and our Police Chief Constables have made a mockery of equality in the justice system. It is a fundamental right that all are treated equally.Guide lines where sentences are policing are based on race, religion and personal circumstance is not acceptable.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
